citation: Proclamation under the State Service Amendment (Performance) Act 2011 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the State Service Amendment (Performance) Act 2011

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the State Service Amendment (Performance) Act 2011 fix 17 August 2011 as the day on which that Act commences.

8 August 2011

E. C. CRAWFORD

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

LARA GIDDINGS

Premier

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 August 2011

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
